comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: F-6D, photo reconnaissance version, assigned to CAPT William A. Shomo, 82nd Tac Rec Sq, 71st TRG. This is the aircraft he was flying during the mission for which he was awarded the Medal of Honor; later he was assigned P-51D serial 44-72505, which he nicknamed "The Flying Undertaker."

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 40469102@N02
comment._content: Nice 12 minute video about Lt Shomo with a nod to his crew chief, SSgt Winkel. www.youtube.com/watch?v=A4LUG1Ix4KE
